description:
16th floor 1 bedroom apartment full of sunlight in the heart of Harlem. Views of upper Manhattan. An avenue away from the 2/3 train and about 20 minutes from Times Square and minutes from Central Park. Steps away from Harlem attractions such as The Apollo and Red Rooster. The building has a 24hr doorman and security.

Great for couple or a small group of friends.

You'll have access to the entire apartment. Just treat the space as you would your own home!

The apartment is in the heart of Harlem and walking distance from Harlem attractions like The Apollo and Red Rooster.

Very easy to get around as the apartment is close to major subways.
name: Cozy 1 bedroom apartment minutes from Central Park
review: Shaina was a great host. She was accessible and easy to communicate with. Her apartment is quaint and perfect for a couple who plans to visit the city and be out. Apartment has great scenic views and accessible to transit. Harlem has great food near by.
